evidence.claim: Flock utilizes AWS services for cloud hosting and data management.
The platform is compliant with HIPAA standards for handling healthcare data.
Flock offers integration capabilities with FHIR for healthcare data interoperability.
The company employs Kafka for real-time data streaming solutions.
Flock supports various EDI X12 transaction sets facilitating healthcare transactions.

icp.icp_reason: No public evidence of specific X12 use cases or healthcare data exchanges found.
